security: Releasing information about Rodriguez's role as a courier for CIA operations in Cuba could compromise ongoing operations and potentially expose sources. Quote: "on occasion his Agency has utilized Rodriguez as a courier for transmitting material between the US. and Cuba. This material has dealt with CIA operations in Cuba."
summary: FBI memo from S.J. Papich to L'Allier regarding Ismael Rodriguez, a comptroller for Cubana Airlines who has been used by the CIA as a courier for transmitting material between the U.S. and Cuba related to CIA operations; this information is being directed to the attention of the Nationalities Intelligence Section.
summary_one_paragraph: On August 17, 1961, S.J. Papich of the FBI sent a memo to L'Allier concerning Ismael Rodriguez, who works as a comptroller for Cubana Airlines in New York City and has been a source for the Bureau. David Hanlon from the CIA's Office of Security informed the FBI's Liaison Agent that the CIA has used Rodriguez as a courier for transporting materials between the U.S. and Cuba related to CIA operations. As a result, Papich is forwarding this information to the Nationalities Intelligence Section.
title: ISMAEL RODRIGUEZ
